title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\UpdateClusterRequest
name: UpdateClusterRequest
description:
UpdateClusterRequest updates the settings of a cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.UpdateClusterRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the cluster to upgrade. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name (project, location, cluster) of the cluster to update. Specified in the format projects/*/locations/*/clusters/*.
